name: Instagram Reels
special_instructions: Username is required to fetch the reels. If it is not provided, return can_fulfill false and explain accordingly
ResultsLimit is the maximum number of reels you want to scrape per profile. If you set it to 5, you'll get 5 reels for each profile you've included
Download format can be JSON, Excel, HTML and other formats
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any policy, legal, privacy or any other limit
